user.title: Coffee Machine Entities
user.description:
Select the entities that control your coffee machine.

[Documentation]({docs_url})

drinks.title: Available Drinks
drinks.description: Select all drinks that your machine supports. Only these will appear when creating recipes.

faults.title: Fault Sensors
faults.description: Select all binary sensors that indicate machine faults. Recipe will stop if any of these turn ON.

notify.title: Notifications & Storage
notify.description:
Configure notifications and where to store recipes.

For mobile push, enter the full service name e.g. `notify.mobile_app_my_phone`. Leave as `none` to disable.

data.recipes_file: Recipes YAML filename (relative to HA config dir)

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one Coffee Recipe Manager instance is allowed.

machine_drinks.title: Available Drinks
machine_drinks.description: Select all drinks that your machine supports. Only these will appear when creating or editing recipes.

recipe_add.title: Add Recipe
recipe_add.description: Enter the recipe name and description. Next you will add steps one by one.

recipe_step.title: Step {step_num} — {recipe_name}
recipe_step.description: Select a **Drink** (or leave as *— None —* to skip) and set how many times each auxiliary switch should run (0 = skip).

data.add_another: Add another step after this one

recipe_edit.title: Edit Recipe: {recipe_key}
recipe_edit.description: Update the recipe name and description. Next you will re-enter steps one by one.

recipe_delete_select.title: Delete Recipe
recipe_delete_select.description: Select a recipe to permanently delete.

error.switch_entity_required: Select at least one switch entity.
error.entity_not_found: One or more selected entities were not found in Home Assistant.
error.step_no_action: At least one action is required: select a drink or set a switch count ≥ 1.

abort.no_recipes: No recipes found. Add one first.
abort.recipe_save_failed: Failed to save recipe — check the steps format.
abort.invalid_drink_in_recipe: Recipe contains drinks not supported by this machine. Check the configured drink list.
